headline: Medtronic expands AI, robotics hub in London; Virtuoso robot gets FDA breakthrough status
summary: The Medtronic center will facilitate surgeon collaboration and AI-powered decision support. At Virtuoso Surgical, a robotic approach to bladder lesion removal is expected to improve precision.

raw.headline: Medtronic expands AI, robotics hub in London; Virtuoso robot gets FDA breakthrough status
raw.summary: The Medtronic center will facilitate surgeon collaboration and AI-powered decision support. At Virtuoso Surgical, a robotic approach to bladder lesion removal is expected to improve precision.

headline: Medtronic Receives FDA Nod for Altaviva Device: Stock to Gain?
summary: MDT gains FDA approval for its Altaviva device, a minimally invasive bladder control therapy with long-lasting benefits.

raw.headline: Medtronic Receives FDA Nod for Altaviva Device: Stock to Gain?
raw.summary: MDT gains FDA approval for its Altaviva device, a minimally invasive bladder control therapy with long-lasting benefits.

headline: Robotics and MedSurg Drive Stryker Growth Amid Margin Pressures
summary: SYK posts 11% sales growth and EPS beat for Q2, driven by Mako robotics and MedSurg strength, but faces cost and margin headwinds.

headline: Medtronic expands London site to advance robotic surgery innovation
summary: The company has stated that the site brings together some of the UK’s leading medical software engineers.
